lifecycle.about: Agent initialization and task receipt. This workflow is predefined and cannot be modified by behaviors. You have already read agent.xml before entering this phase.

task.do: Read mail.xml to learn how to communicate.

task.action: Check your inbox for task assignment
task.do: Use check-inbox to find unread emails. Look for GETTING STARTED emails.
Use read-email to get the full task details. Determine what is being asked of you.
Based on your task, select which behaviors you need from the catalog you already reviewed. Only select behaviors that match your task requirements.
Read the full behavior file for each behavior you selected. Do not load behaviors you did not select.
Send ACKNOWLEDGED email to your supervisor confirming you received and understand the task.

on-error.do: If any task above fails: 1. Send QUITTING email to your supervisor AND ceo 2. Explain what failed and why 3. Exit - do not proceed to runtime phase

lifecycle.next: Enter the runtime phase with your selected behaviors.
